content: crochet drops christmas bobeche in cotton viscose and glitter drops extra 0-519 small to fit standard candles large to fit candles with a diameter of 5 5 cm \ 2¼ materials drops cotton viscose from garnstudio 50 g color no 05 red 50 g color no 07 deep red and use drops glitter 2 spools color no 03 copper 1 ball of each color cotton viscose makes approx 6 small bobeches or 2 large bobeches drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm \ e/4 crochet with 1 thread cotton viscose of each color + 2 threads glitter = 4 threads uk version 1 1 http //www garnstudio com/pattern php id=3923&cid=19
